de.ityx.contex.interfaces.document

Interface CDocument

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CBase, Licensable, Modifiable, Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CDocumentImage, CImageDocument, IDigCDocument, IOCRDocument
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCDocument, EmailDocument, IDig_document, ImageDocument, OCRDocument, PDFDocument, RemoteDesktopDocument, StringDocument

    public interface CDocument
extends CBase, Modifiable, Licensable
    The main document interface of contex. Represents all kinds of documents and its attached resources.
    Author:
    root

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface de.ityx.contex.interfaces.document.CBase

        CBase.StateKeys

      • getPayload

        byte[] getPayload()
        Returns the original representation of this document. For example the binary tif data of a tif file.

      • setPayload

        Sets this document's title.

      • getUniqueid

        Long getUniqueid()
        Gets the internally set unique identifier for this document. Should not be altered.

      • setUniqueid

        void setUniqueid(Long uniqueid)
        Internally used. Don't ever change the unique identifier!
        Parameters:
        uniqueid -

      • getUri

        String getUri()
        Returns the original source uri for this document. This part identifies a document for the licensing system. If you change this, the document will lose its license information and may be counted twice.

      • setUri

        void setUri(String uri)
        Set the original source uri. Internally used. If you change this, the document will lose its license information and may be counted twice.

      • getSourceObject

        Object getSourceObject()
        If this document was converted from a different object, you may get it's predecessor with this method. Not always supported, may be null!

      • getDisplayable

        CDisplayable getDisplayable()
        Returns a possibility to display this Document on screen. Not always supported, may be null!

      • cutDocument

        CDocument cutDocument(List<Integer> oldPages,
                    List<Integer> newPages)
        Cuts a document into two pieces. newPages kommen in das neue Dokument
        Parameters:
        oldPages - are all pages staying in the old document. Starts with Page 1 (not 0)
        newPages - all pages for the new document.
